display_long_description:
Blaston is a fast-paced PvP VR shooter where your survival hinges on one simple rule: Never. Stay. Still.

Duel players in a slow-motion bullet-hell as you collect weapons, personalize your loadout, and move your whole body to dodge oncoming fire as you line up your next perfect shot. Customize your weapons with game-changing attachments, glow up your avatar and arsenal with new looks, and create player-hosted tournaments in the Ozo Lounge. Get ready to break a sweat!

💥 FREE-TO-PLAY — Everyone can get in on the action and take aim on the competition
💥 REVAMPED STORE — Re-organized with all new categories for an improved player experience
💥 MORE WEAPON ATTACHMENTS — 24 brand new options for 8 different weapon types
💥 MORE STYLE OPTIONS — New avatar and weapon skins are ready to equip

Now with mixed reality passthrough mode. Blaston Spectator app available for PC.

Blaston — a game of firepower and physicality from the cyberpunk warriors at Resolution Games.
